law.catch_line: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated....

text.section: In this title the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Destitute adult child" means an adult child who:
has no means of subsistence; and
cannot be self-supporting, due to mental or physical infirmity.

"Destitute parent" means a parent who:
has no means of subsistence; and
cannot be self-supporting, due to old age or mental or physical infirmity.
